schema.name: Healthyfied Potato Vegetable Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Garlic Marble Potatoes, Carrots, Cabbage, Eggplant, and Yellow raw under cold water.
Dice the Carrots, Cabbage, Eggplant, and Yellow raw, and mince the Garlic.
Boil the Garlic Marble Potatoes in a pot of water until they are tender, about 15 minutes.
In another pot, blanch the diced Carrots, Cabbage, and Eggplant for about 5 minutes, then drain.
Combine the boiled potatoes, blanched vegetables, minced garlic in a large bowl.
Add the mayonnaise, ground pepper, and lemon juice to the bowl. Mix well until all the ingredients are evenly coated.

schema.description: Dive into a bowl of Healthyfied Potato Vegetable Salad, a delight for anyone looking to enjoy a high-fiber, nutritious meal. Crafted with an assortment of fresh vegetables and seasoned to perfection, this salad epitomizes the essence of healthy living through 'Healthyfied' and 'Healthified Recipes'. It's a perfect choice for those seeking a refreshing, hearty meal.
